title: Who are the best teachers of mathematics on YouTube for the 12th class? - Quora

response.answer_text: Check out khan academy on YouTube It's one of the best channel on YouTube You will understand the concepts very clearly If you want test papers then you can check out The No.1 Education Site with Study Material & Live Classes for CBSE, ICSE, CPT, IITJEE, AIPMT & mor
In my point of view if only u have to study ncert questions thoroughly and only upto class 12 level then I think priya thappar is the best I studied from that channel
